trans-unit.source: Common Type System & Common Language Specification
trans-unit.target: 一般類型系統和 Common Language Specification

trans-unit.source: Again, two terms that are freely used in the .NET world, they actually are crucial to understand how the .NET platform enables multi-language development and to understand how it works.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，這是在 .NET 世界內自由使用的兩個詞彙，它們實際上對了解 .NET 平台如何啟用多語言開發和其運作方式十分重要。

trans-unit.source: Common Type System
trans-unit.target: 一般類型系統

trans-unit.source: To start from the beginning, remember that the .NET platform is _language agnostic_.
trans-unit.target: 若要從頭開始，請記住，.NET 平台_無從驗證語言_。

trans-unit.source: This doesn’t just mean that a programmer can write her code in any language that can be compiled to IL.
trans-unit.target: 這不只是表示程式設計人員可以使用任何可編譯為 IL 的語言來撰寫自己的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: It also means that she needs to be able to interact with code written in other languages that are able to be used on the .NET platform.
trans-unit.target: 也表示她必須能夠與使用其他語言所撰寫的程式碼互動，而這些語言可以在 .NET 平台上使用。

trans-unit.source: In order to do this transparently, there has to be a common way to describe all supported types.
trans-unit.target: 若要透明地執行這項操作，必須要有通用的方式來描述所有支援的類型。

trans-unit.source: This is what the Common Type System (CTS) is in charge of doing.
trans-unit.target: 這是一般類型系統 (CTS) 負責執行的作業。

trans-unit.source: It was made to do several things:
trans-unit.target: 它是用來執行下列事項︰

trans-unit.source: Establish a framework for cross-language execution.
trans-unit.target: 建立跨語言執行的架構。

trans-unit.source: Provide an object-oriented model to support implementing various languages on .NET platform.
trans-unit.target: 提供物件導向模型，以支援在 .NET 平台上實作各種語言。

trans-unit.source: Define a set of rules that all languages must follow when it comes to working with types.
trans-unit.target: 定義所有語言在需要處理類型時必須遵循的一組規則。

trans-unit.source: Provide a library that contains the basic primitive types that are used in application development (i.e. `Boolean`, `Byte`, `Char` etc.)
trans-unit.target: 提供包含應用程式開發時使用之基本原始類型 (即 `Boolean`、`Byte`、`Char` 等) 的程式庫。

trans-unit.source: CTS defines two main kinds of types that should be supported: reference and value types.
trans-unit.target: CTS 定義應該支援的兩種主要類型︰參考和實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Their names point to their definitions.
trans-unit.target: 它們的名稱會指向其定義。

trans-unit.source: Reference types’ objects are represented by a reference to the object’s actual value; a reference here is similar to a pointer in C/C++.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的物件是由物件實際值的參考來表示；這裡的參考類似 C/C++ 中的指標。

trans-unit.source: It simply refers to a memory location where the objects’ values are.
trans-unit.target: 它指的就是物件值所在的記憶體位置。

trans-unit.source: This has a profound impact on how these types are used.
trans-unit.target: 這對這些類型的使用方式具有深遠影響。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a reference type to a variable and then pass that variable into a method, for instance, any changes to the object will be reflected on the main object; there is no copying.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將參考類型指派給變數，然後將該變數傳遞給方法，例如，物件的任何變更都會反映在主要物件中；未進行複製。

trans-unit.source: Value types are the opposite, where the objects are represented by their values.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件是由物件的值來表示，則實值類型就是相反值。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a value type to a variable, you are essentially copying a value of the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將實值類型指派給變數，則基本上會複製物件的值。

trans-unit.source: CTS defines several categories of types, each with their specific semantics and usage:
trans-unit.target: CTS 定義數種分類的類型，各有其特定語意和用法︰

trans-unit.source: Classes
trans-unit.target: 類別

trans-unit.source: Structures
trans-unit.target: 結構

trans-unit.source: Enums
trans-unit.target: 列舉

trans-unit.source: Interfaces
trans-unit.target: 介面

trans-unit.source: Delegates
trans-unit.target: 委派

trans-unit.source: CTS also defines all other properties of the types, such as access modifiers, what are valid type members, how inheritance and overloading works and so on.
trans-unit.target: CTS 也會定義類型的所有其他屬性 (例如存取修飾詞)、什麼是有效類型成員、繼承和多載的運作方式等。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, going deep into any of those is beyond the scope of an introductory article such as this, but you can consult [More resources](#more-resources) section at the end for links to more in-depth content that covers these topics.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，深入探討其中任何項目不在簡介文章的範圍 (例如這項)，但您可以查閱涵蓋這些主題之更深入內容連結結尾的[更多資源](#more-resources)一節。

trans-unit.source: Common Language Specification
trans-unit.target: Common Language Specification

trans-unit.source: To enable full interoperability scenarios, all objects that are created in code must rely on some commonality in the languages that are consuming them (are their _callers_).
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用完整互通性案例，則透過程式碼建立的所有物件都必須依賴使用它們之語言的一些共通性 (即其_呼叫端_)。

trans-unit.source: Since there are numerous different languages, .NET platform has specified those commonalities in something called the **Common Language Specification** (CLS).
trans-unit.target: 因為有多種不同的語言，所以 .NET 平台已透過 **Common Language Specification** (CLS) 指定這些共通性。

trans-unit.source: CLS defines a set of features that are needed by many common applications.
trans-unit.target: CLS 定義許多常見應用程式所需的一組功能。

trans-unit.source: It also provides a sort of recipe for any language that is implemented on top of .NET platform on what it needs to support.
trans-unit.target: 它也提供一種方法，以在需要支援的 .NET 平台上實作任何語言。

trans-unit.source: CLS is a subset of the CTS.
trans-unit.target: CLS 是 CTS 的子集。

trans-unit.source: This means that all of the rules in the CTS also apply to the CLS, unless the CLS rules are more strict.
trans-unit.target: 除非 CLS 規則更嚴格，否則這表示 CTS 中的所有規則也適用於 CLS。

trans-unit.source: If a component is built using only the rules in the CLS, that is, it exposes only the CLS features in its API, it is said to be **CLS-compliant**.
trans-unit.target: 如果元件只是使用 CLS 中的規則所建置 (亦即，它只會在其 API 中公開 CLS 功能)，表示**符合 CLS 標準**。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the `<framework-librares>` are CLS-compliant precisely because they need to work across all of the languages that are supported on the .NET platform.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`<framework-librares>` 完全符合 CLS 標準，原因是它們需要作用於 .NET 平台上支援的所有語言。

trans-unit.source: You can consult the documents in the [More Resources](#more-resources) section below to get an overview of all the features in the CLS.
trans-unit.target: 您可以查閱下面[更多資源](#more-resources)一節中的文件，以取得 CLS 中所有功能的概觀。
